law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Consumer" has the same meaning as that term has in Title 13 of this article.
"Dealer" means a person who engages in the business of selling or leasing household goods to consumers residing in Maryland.
"Estimated delivery date" means the date established under § 14-1802 or § 14-1803 of this subtitle on which the dealer reasonably anticipates to deliver the ordered household good to the consumer.

section.section: "Household good" means any article or set of articles used to furnish or supply a residential dwelling such as a sofa, cabinet, rug, carpeting, washing machine, refrigerator, television, dining room set, or range.

"Household good" does not include:
Any article taken by the consumer on the date the article was ordered;
Any article ordered by mail; or
Any permanent fixture.
